option.name: originalContent
option.value:
CLAUDE_MODEL="claude-sonnet-4-5" ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=""
# Set to 1 if you're using uv to run the project # Set to 0 if you're *not* using uv USE_UV=1

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# LLM Provider Selection # Choose "claude" or "ollama" LLM_PROVIDER=ollama
# Ollama Configuration (when LLM_PROVIDER=ollama) OLLAMA_MODEL=llama3.2
# Claude Configuration (when LLM_PROVIDER=claude) CLAUDE_MODEL="claude-sonnet-4-5" ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=""
# Set to 1 if you're using uv to run the project # Set to 0 if you're *not* using uv USE_UV=1
